properties.query:
//Searches for access by applications that have not previously accessed an Azure Key Vault in the last 14 days and returns all actions by those applications
let operationlist = dynamic(["SecretGet", "KeyGet", "VaultGet"]);
let starttime = 14d;
let endtime = 1d;
let detection=
    AzureDiagnostics
    | where TimeGenerated between (ago(starttime) .. ago(endtime))
    | where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
    | where ResultType == "Success"
    | where OperationName in (operationlist)
    | where isnotempty(identity_claim_appid_g)
    | project-rename KeyVaultName=Resource, AppId=identity_claim_appid_g
    | distinct KeyVaultName, AppId
    | join kind=rightanti  (
        AzureDiagnostics
        | where TimeGenerated > ago(endtime)
        | where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
        | where ResultType == "Success"
        | where OperationName in (operationlist)
        | where isnotempty(identity_claim_appid_g)
        | project-rename
            KeyVaultName=Resource,
            AppId=identity_claim_appid_g
        | distinct KeyVaultName, AppId)
        on KeyVaultName, AppId;
AzureDiagnostics
| where TimeGenerated > ago(endtime)
| where ResourceType == "VAULTS"
| where ResultType == "Success"
| project-rename
    KeyVaultName=Resource,
    AppId=identity_claim_appid_g
| join kind=inner detection on KeyVaultName, AppId
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    CallerIPAddress,
    Action = split(requestUri_s, "&")[1],
    AppId,
    AppInfo =clientInfo_s,
    ResourceGroup,
    SubscriptionId,
    KeyVaultName,
    KeyVaultTarget=id_s,
    OperationName
// Removing false positive call from Microsoft that appears to happen daily
| where not(CallerIPAddress == "52.244.48.88" and Action == "MaskCMKEnabledProperties=true")
| where not(CallerIPAddress == "52.244.16.218" and Action == "MaskCMKEnabledProperties=true")
properties.displayName: App Operations in KeyVault not seen in 14 days
properties.description:
Searches for access by applications that have not previously accessed an Azure Key Vault in the last 14 days and returns all actions by those applications.
PLATFORM:Azure AD,Microsoft 365,IaaS
